DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine whether R115777 antitumor activity patient progressive , metastatic , hormone refractory prostate cancer . II . Determine safety pharmacokinetics regimen patient population . OUTLINE : Patients receive oral R115777 every 12 hour day 1-21 . Courses repeat every 4 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 15-30 patient accrue study within 10-16 month .
